Tweaked.name: Spotify++
Tweaked.description: Spotify with no ads, and infinite skips.

Other.name: Stardew Valley
Other.description: Move to the countryside, and cultivate a new life in this award-winning open-ended farming RPG! With over 50+ hours of gameplay content and new Mobile-specific features, such as auto-save and multiple controls options.

Other.name: Bloons TD 6
Other.description: Craft your perfect defense from a combination of powerful Monkey Towers and awesome Heroes, then pop every last invading Bloon!

Other.name: Warped Kart Racers
Other.description:
Get warped into the ultimate kart racing game - by yourself, or multiplayer - featuring the stars of 20th Televisionâ€™s hit animated shows: American Dad!, Family Guy, King of the Hill and Solar Opposites! Experience iconic locations and even some surprise ones in your quest for karting glory!

TAKE CONTROL of one of 20 playable characters and beat your friends in riotous races and brutal battles

Master RACING AND BATTLING across 16 maps drawn from fan-favorite episodes

Play an extensive SINGLE PLAYER campaign, or compete in 8-player MULTIPLAYER matches

Complete DAILY CHALLENGES to unlock new CHARACTERS, SKINS, KARTS and CUSTOMIZATIONS
